attributes.action: To stop the banning of petrol and diesel cars.
attributes.additional_details: Article 24. The right to play. Technically, we can have fun in our cars. The sound of the cars may bring happiness to the driver, The way the car can do several things that electric cars may not be able to.
attributes.background: In 2040, it has been said that petrol and diesel cars will be banned. I think it would be quite annoying for big car fanatics, several people would agree that if this is banned it will take away the enjoyment that you get from the cars with petrol/diesel.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
